Package com.tangosol.net

Class DefaultCacheFactoryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tangosol.net.ScopedCacheFactoryBuilder
      • com.tangosol.net.DefaultCacheFactoryBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheFactoryBuilder, SessionProvider, Comparable<SessionProvider>
    public class DefaultCacheFactoryBuilder
extends ScopedCacheFactoryBuilder
    DefaultCacheFactoryBuilder is the default implementation of CacheFactoryBuilder. As of Coherence 3.7.2, this class simply extends ScopedCacheFactoryBuilder. Prior to Coherence 3.5.1, a single ConfigurableCacheFactory per cluster member was created. This behavior is preserved in SingletonCacheFactoryBuilder.
    Since:
    Coherence 3.5.1
    Author:
    rhl 2009.07.14, pp 2011.01.20
